objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Science Fiction lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about health and fitness using informal register
Students create original scifi themed content about health and fitness in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using informal register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in informal register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
